alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:15PM CDT until August 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southwestern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 415 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ozark, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Headland, Ozark, Fort Novosel, Newton, Newville, Hunt Field, Tumbleton, Kirkland Crossroads, Grandberry Crossroads, Mabson, Ewell, Dale County Lake, Headland Municipal A/P, Dancey, Balkum, Sylvan Grove, Echo, Dean Church Road, Blackwood and Capps. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
